content: proceed as previously you until you have 7 row of 7 instead of 2ch and ignoring now know how to join all starbursts stop when you the 2ch below you can join corners get to the final long side as these together by 1ch slip_stitch this is slightly different into the space and 1ch the join on the edge should continue along the edge when you get back to the look li ke this until you get to the corner first 3dtr join with a slip_stitch in turn the corner in the usual the top of the first 3ch way and work along the don t cut the yarn you bottom edge exactly as you can continue with the next did on the last long side round without rejoining you now have your central panel of starbursts don t worry about the edges that have unjoined corners these will be sorted out in the next round © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 12 grace from now on the blanket is worked in rounds to ensure it lays flat and does not begin to twist or skew some rounds will be worked on the right side and some on the reverse at the start of each round the pattern will state either rsu right side up or rsd right side down to make it easier to keep track of which side you are working on particularly as it gets bigger i suggest attaching a piece of contrasting yarn to the right side round 1 rsu you will start round 1 at the slip_stitch to the next space and 1ss 2ch and then 2tr in same space point where the continuous in the space join ended with right side up rsu 3tr in next 2 spaces at the to join the corners of the the stitch in the left-hand corner 3tr 2ch 3tr 3tr in squares work 1tr in the corner space to do this the next 3 spaces right-hand corner space yarn over insert hook in now work a tr2tog right-hand corner space decrease stitch with the yarn over and pull up a first half of the stitch in the loop yarn over and pull right- hand corner space through 2 loops 2 loops on and the second half of hook © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 13 grace yarn over insert hook into yarn over and pull through yarn over and pull through left-hand corner space 2 loops 3 loops on hook 3 loops 1 loop on hook yarn over and pull up a loop 4 loops on hook complete the stitch by the completed stitch will continue working around working 1tr in the left-hand look like this don t worry the edge and slip_stitch to join do corner space repeat this that it dips down this will not cut
